Unofficial :mastodon: Mastodon update notifications.
Curated by a 🧍 human, but I occasionally send out 🤖 automated notifications.

DM this account if you want to opt out of notifications or have feedback. This bot respects the nobot hashtag in profile bios.

Our crawler respects exclusion rules in /robots.txt and can be identified by the following User-Agent:
UpdateNotificationBot/1.0 (+https://mastodon.social/@update_notifications)
